refnamediv.refpurpose: Random misc utilities to manipulate Bonobo_ServerInfo structures.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: enum Bonobo_ActivationPropertyType
bonobo_server_info_prop_find ()
refsect2.para: Tries to find a server with the given property. Returns NULL if not found.

listitem.simpara: the server where to seek the data.
the data to seek in the server.
a pointer to the Bonobo_ActivationProperty structure.

refsect2.title: bonobo_activation_info_stringify ()

warning.para: bonobo_activation_info_stringify is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Serializes actinfo into a char *. Should be freed with g_free().

refsect2.title: bonobo_activation_servinfo_to_actinfo ()

warning.para: bonobo_activation_servinfo_to_actinfo is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function converts a Bonobo_ServerInfo structure to a BonoboActivationInfo structure. The returned structure should be freed with bonobo_activation_info_free.

listitem.simpara: a newly allocated initialized BonoboActivationInfo structure.

refsect2.title: bonobo_activation_id_parse ()

warning.para: bonobo_activation_id_parse is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns a pointer to a newly allocated BonoboActivationInfo structure (to be freed with bonobo_activation_info_free) initialized with the data of actid.

refsect2.title: bonobo_activation_info_new ()

warning.para: bonobo_activation_info_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function allocates a BonoboActicationInfo structure and returns it. Should NOT be called from outside of this code.

listitem.simpara: a newly allocated non-initialized BonoboActicationInfo structure.

warning.para: bonobo_activation_info_free is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: bonobo_server_info_prop_lookup ()
